org.spongepowered.api.event.network

Interface GameClientLoginEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cancellable, ConnectEvent, Event, GameEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GameClientAuthEvent, GameClientConnectEvent

    public interface GameClientLoginEvent
extends ConnectEvent
    Represents an event fired during the login process.
    See Also:
    GameClientAuthEvent, GameClientConnectEvent

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RemoteConnection getConnection()
      Gets the RemoteConnection representing the client connection.
      Optional<Cause> getDisconnectCause()
      Gets the currently set reason why the client will be disconnected if the event is cancelled.
      Optional<Text> getDisconnectMessage()
      Gets the disconnect message that will show to the client if the event is cancelled.
      GameProfile getProfile()
      Gets the profile of the client attempting to connect.
      void setDisconnectCause(Cause cause)
      Sets the cause for disconnecting the client if the event is cancelled.
      void setDisconnectMessage(Text message)
      Sets the disconnect message that will show to the client if the event is cancelled.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.GameEvent

        getGame

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.event.Event

        getCallbacks

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        RemoteConnection getConnection()
        Gets the RemoteConnection representing the client connection.
        Returns:
        The remote connection

      • getProfile

        GameProfile getProfile()
        Gets the profile of the client attempting to connect.
        Returns:
        The client's profile

      • getDisconnectMessage

        Optional<Text> getDisconnectMessage()
        Gets the disconnect message that will show to the client if the event is cancelled.
        Returns:
        The disconnect message

      • setDisconnectMessage

        void setDisconnectMessage(@Nullable
                          Text message)
        Sets the disconnect message that will show to the client if the event is cancelled. Passing null will will result in the message being set by the server if the event is cancelled.
        Parameters:
        message - The disconnect message

      • getDisconnectCause

        Optional<Cause> getDisconnectCause()
        Gets the currently set reason why the client will be disconnected if the event is cancelled.
        Returns:
        The reason for disconnecting, if set

      • setDisconnectCause

        void setDisconnectCause(@Nullable
                        Cause cause)
        Sets the cause for disconnecting the client if the event is cancelled. Passing null will result in the cause being set by the server if the event is cancelled.
        Parameters:
        cause - The cause
